trans-unit.target:
Each facet of the Crystalline Mean has a list of requested deliveries. <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Iola<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> of the <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Facet of Forging<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will accept items from <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>blacksmiths<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>armorers<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, and <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>goldsmiths<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. The items requested will vary according to your level, and may be crafted by any of the corresponding classes. To begin the crafting process, select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Logs<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> from the main menu, followed by <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Crafting Log<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Next, select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Special Recipes<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> from within the requisite crafting discipline, then <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Class<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, and lastly <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Crystarium Deliveries<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to locate the desired recipe. The esteem gauge will build with each successful delivery. Fill the gauge completely and your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>esteem level<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will increase, allowing you to progress through the story.
You may deliver both normal and high-quality items, and you can also submit multiple items simultaneously. High-quality items do not result in a larger increase in esteem, but you will receive greater rewards upon delivery.

Each facet of the Crystalline Mean has a list of requested deliveries. <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Thiuna<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> of the <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Facet of Crafting<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will accept items from <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>carpenters<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>leatherworkers<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, and <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>weavers<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. The items requested will vary according to your level, and may be crafted by any of the corresponding classes. To begin the crafting process, select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Logs<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> from the main menu, followed by <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Crafting Log<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Next, select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Special Recipes<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> from within the requisite crafting discipline, then <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Class<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, and lastly <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Crystarium Deliveries<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to locate the desired recipe. The esteem gauge will build with each successful delivery. Fill the gauge completely and your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>esteem level<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will increase, allowing you to progress through the story.
You may deliver both normal and high-quality items, and you can also submit multiple items simultaneously. High-quality items do not result in a larger increase in esteem, but you will receive greater rewards upon delivery.

Each facet of the Crystalline Mean has a list of requested deliveries. <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Bethric<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> of the <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Facet of Nourishing<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will accept items from <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>alchemists<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> and <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>culinarians<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. The esteem gauge will build with each successful delivery. Fill the gauge completely and your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>esteem level<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will increase, allowing you to progress through the story.
You may deliver both normal and high-quality items, and you can also submit multiple items simultaneously. High-quality items do not result in a larger increase in esteem, but you will receive greater rewards upon delivery.
